sentence: There's also a question of whether Rep. Brian Kemp (R-GA), who is heated reelection battle, would call a special legislative session to craft even stricter laws.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Here are the specifics on the 22 state laws that will go into effect if the Supreme Court eliminates Roe
